title: Ticket #4759: ClassAd references don't handle My properly
description:
When calculating the internal references of a ClassAd expression, attribute references that include My. aren't followed properly. The named attribute is included in the list of internal references, but any attributes it refers to are missed.

For example, in the following ad, the internal references of Requirements includes Foo, but not Bar: 

Requirements = My.Foo
Foo = Bar
Bar = True

Specifically, the ClassAd library would mark My.Foo as an external reference, then the compat layer would move that to the set of internal references (after stripping the My.).
remarks:
2014-Dec-08 17:00:45 by jfrey:
There are still some issues calculating internal references when there are nested ads, but I'll save that for another ticket.

2015-Jan-22 11:46:00 by johnkn:
CODE_REVIEW: looks good.

2015-Jan-26 10:55:17 by jfrey:
The effect of this bug on users is minimal and hard to characterize. No version history.
